Articles.Content:
We are going to make a new shuttle! (kinda)

currently, this will just be a test of what i will do on Blender

the idea/design is this

![scaled.php?server=834&filename=scan0002ks.jpg&res=landing](http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg834/scaled.php?server=834&filename=scan0002ks.jpg&res=landing)

i will be modelling this shuttle in which it\'s fuselage will be based on the Hope Shuttle, the shuttle will need retexturing, but i i don\'t know what dtyle to texture in and i don\'t know how i could texture anything proper

lastly, i would add an extra 2 batteries on the wings using Krezung\'s energy plugin (with ion drives on the ends of course)

Progress:

modelled all part exept wings, yet to export ASAS and Mechjeb part, multiple problems with nodes and textures not implemented

after some hard toil decent amount of work, i have modelled the cockpit!

this may or may not be the final product though

![scaled.php?server=804&filename=sfipscockpit.jpg&res=landing](http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg804/scaled.php?server=804&filename=sfipscockpit.jpg&res=landing)

Sorry i haven\'t posted in a while, but progress has been comparitively slow, i have managed to model everything exept the RCS blocks and the wings(stabilisers included) i am now getting on with progress with putting it in actual KSP now, i am also having trouble texturing, half not knowing what bits are on the UV map, other half not thinking how i could model it (had second thoughts from having it same style as Hope shuttle)
just wodering, is anyone going to support me with this project? you don\'t have to do anything.

I think it looks great!

I am also currently working on a addon ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Maybe you need to make some better wings? (Longer? makes them more awesome ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif))

Just pm me if you want my meaning of some of the other parts

> 
> I think it looks great!
> 
> I am also currently working on a addon ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> 
> Maybe you need to make some better wings? (Longer? makes them more awesome ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif))
> 
> Just pm me if you want my meaning of some of the other parts

i will need help texturing, but i think i have everthing covered
other than a few export problems and node misplacements, the project is going well, but i am yet to model wings and stabilisers!

> 
> I thinked about a thing, you fully decide!
> 
> What do you say about a partnership? I can do some textures (Photoshop ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)), balance some things and test some things.
> 
> I can also make models (Not so good D:)
> 
> I hope you will say yes ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) (I hope :/)

sorry, but i\'ll pass

so i was thinking, i reworked the fuel tank so the trapezoid structures are engines, but what particle/thrust effect should i put on it?

![scaled.php?server=29&filename=sfipsengine.jpg&res=landing](http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg29/scaled.php?server=29&filename=sfipsengine.jpg&res=landing)

i was thinking of something energy-like, similar to an ion engine

> 
> so i was thinking, i reworked the fuel tank so the trapezoid structures are engines, but what particle/thrust effect should i put on it?

wasn\'t a rhetorical question

ok, now i should give you some visual progress and tell you i am running on a sh!tload of problems here

![scaled.php?server=528&filename=someprogress.jpg&res=landing](http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg528/scaled.php?server=528&filename=someprogress.jpg&res=landing)

[list type=decimal]

[li]the RCS tank and nose block have texture problems and are invisible it seems[/li]

[li]the RCS tank have node problems[/li]

[li]I don\'t know if the RCS block node doesn\'t work either since it is invisible[/li]

[li]node problems with the engines[/li]

[li]not modelled the wings and as long as the wing problem with the Hope shuttle exists, i don\'t intend to for now[/li]

[li]not modelled the wings and as long as the wing problem with the Hope shuttle exists, i don\'t intend to for now[/li]

[li]not yet exported the ASAS or the Mechjeb part[/li]

[li]not sure if the RCS block or the engines work at all![/li]

but how should i texture it and what style?

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/t348e24vDyA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

im attatching SF-IPS files in order, here it is the fuel tank
here is the RCS tank
the invisible RCS block
the Engine

'looks at downloads which would say someone is helping'

0 downloads

:C
Well, considering this whole thread consists of just you bumping this topic (which is your own), I\'m guessing nobody is really concerned for it.

> 
> Well, considering this whole thread consists of just you bumping this topic (which is your own), I\'m guessing nobody is really concerned for it.

Please stop doing that to people. And I\'m interested. I\'m texturing it.

> 
> Please stop doing that to people. And I\'m interested. I\'m texturing it.

Dalfite can be as cynical as he wants, and good on you for being interested.

> 
> Well, considering this whole thread consists of just you bumping this topic (which is your own), I\'m guessing nobody is really concerned for it.

You know something Dalfite, you keep up this attitude of putting people down and poo-pooing their efforts and I just might give you a vacation. Seriously, play nice or leave the playground.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Ironic that no one posts anything till Mr cynical comes along and says mean things to you. And yet your still not getting help.

I would help you if I could, but I suffer from the same problem.....
Several persons ARE interested, yet haven\'t got a clue how to Blender/texture/etc.
